WorkPlace.Name: Xterna A/S
WorkPlace.Description:
Xterna har profiler indenfor flere fagområder. Det er vigtigt for Xterna, at vores kunder får de medarbejdere, der har de bedste kvalifikationer til lige netop den opgave, der søges løst. 
Vi har bemanding inden for, og rekrutterer kvalificeret arbejdskraft til, bygge-, anlæg og industr

HiringOrg.Name: Xterna A/S
HiringOrg.Description:
Xterna har profiler indenfor flere fagområder. Det er vigtigt for Xterna, at vores kunder får de medarbejdere, der har de bedste kvalifikationer til lige netop den opgave, der søges løst. 
Vi har bemanding inden for, og rekrutterer kvalificeret arbejdskraft til, bygge-, anlæg og industr

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Xterna A/S is always looking for suitable candidates for varies types of CNC-machinery for varies companies across Denmark. The ideal candidate should have minimum 2 years of experience with the required CNC-machinery. For CNC operators and programmers, we only offer long contracts, so you must be prepared for that. We need your English level to be at least at conversational level because communication is important for your daily tasks.

Job description

We are currently looking for candidates who have experience with one of the following machinery and programs, either programming or operating, if you have both it is even better:

  • Heidenhein
  • Mazak
  • Mori Seiki - Systems: Mitsubishi
  • Gildemeister - Systems: Siemens
  • Okuma
  • Cloos – weldingrobot
  • Siemens 840D
  • Fanuc
  • Haas
  • Laser cutting machines
  • Bending machines

We are also looking for guys who knows how to make drawings in:

  • Mastercam
  • Cadcam
  • Solid works
  • InventorGeneral

Work details:

  • Minimum 37 hours a week, some companies offer overtime, but that will be in individual cases
  • Work clothes is provided by Xterna A/S
  • Often the company decides to hire you after a trial period of 4 months

Company details

Xterna A/S is a temp- and recruiting agency located in Denmark. We provide skilled labor to construction-, industry-, and administration for clients in Scandinavia.
